Class TripListingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.practo.wp.controllers.TripListingController

  • @Controller
public class TripListingController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for listing, posting of the trips, signing up of trees.
    Author:
    ankit

      • post

        @RequestMapping(value="/post",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String post(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                         java.lang.String tripName,
                                                                                         java.lang.String destinationName,
                                                                                         java.lang.String averageCost,
                                                                                         java.lang.String goingDate,
                                                                                         java.lang.String spaceLeft,
                                                                                         java.lang.String goingPeople,
                                                                                         java.lang.String numOfDay,
                                                                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        Function called when a user clicks on post. Creates the post in database and show the trip posted details on another page.
        Parameters:
        model - Model
        tripName - name of the trip given by user
        destinationName - destination name
        averageCost - avergae cost of trip
        goingDate - date on which trip is happening
        spaceLeft - space left
        goingPeople - number of people going
        numOfDay - trip for how many days
        session - HttpSession
        Returns:
        String

      • search

        @RequestMapping(value="/search",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String search(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                            java.lang.String destinationName,
                                                                                            java.lang.String destinationType,
                                                                                            java.lang.String numOfDays,
                                                                                            java.lang.String startDate,
                                                                                            java.lang.String endDate,
                                                                                            java.lang.String averageCost,
                                                                                            org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable,
                                                                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        This function act as search on home page as well as get trips based on filters.
        Parameters:
        model - Model
        destinationName - destination name when user search for trip
        destinationType - destination type
        numOfDays - how many days of trip
        startDate - search between days(start)
        endDate - search between days(end)
        averageCost - average cost per user
        pageable - for getting 10 number of results on evrypage
        session - session variable for session maintainace
        Returns:
        index the homepage/listing page of portal
